nodes.text: Barada Rakul was captain of the Moulee-rah Patogga, a smuggling vessel working with the Hutt kajidics. It was originally owned by Aruk Besadii Aora, but later sold to Jiliac Desilijic Tiron.
Just prior to the Clone Wars, the vessel was seized after it was discovered that it was hauling over one hundred metric tons of ryll.
